item.title: Alessandra add a quote by Martin Luther
item.description: "Even if I knew that tomorrow the world would go to pieces, I would still plant my apple tree." -- Martin Luther

item.title: Alessandra add a quote by Booker T. Washington
item.description: "I will permit no man to narrow and degrade my soul by making me hate him." -- Booker T. Washington

item.title: Alessandra add a quote by Dorothy Parker
item.description: "They sicken of the calm who know the storm." -- Dorothy Parker

item.title: Alessandra add a quote by Martin Niemöller
Alessandra add a quote by William Shakespeare
Alessandra add a quote by Arthur William Edgar O'Shaughnessy
item.description: "We are the music makers, and we are the dreamers of dreams." -- Arthur William Edgar O'Shaughnessy

item.title: Alessandra add a quote by Evelyn Beatrice Hall
item.description: "I disapprove of what you say, but I will defend to the death your right to say it." -- Evelyn Beatrice Hall

item.title: Alessandra add a quote by Baruch Spinoza
item.description: "I do not know how to teach philosophy without becoming a disturber of the peace." -- Baruch Spinoza

item.title: Alessandra add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emmerson
item.description: "Beware what you set your heart upon. For it surely shall be yours." -- Ralph Waldo Emmerson

item.title: Alessandra add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Both Rowling and Meyer, they’re speaking directly to young people. … The real difference is that Jo Rowling is a terrific writer and Stephenie Meyer can’t write worth a darn. She’s not very good." -- Stephen King
